title: Daily reminder that Riot has been ignoring Cass and her playerbase for quite a while
body: It's been several posts complaining about Cass current state and how ignored she is. And even though they gained quite some popularity, not even one rioter has come by saying "pls stahp, whe dont care about her, deal with it" or anything.

replies.body:
Tbh I think they just don't know what to do about her and having a rioter come and say, "Yeah, we don't know what we're gonna do about her" isn't really wurf imo. 

Cass in a weird place, still gets sporadic competitive play because in the hands of a good player, she's VERY strong which is why I think rito is a bit apprehensive about making serious changes. Even if she did get changes, we still have to wait for Poppy, Yorick, Taric's reworks in addition to changes to champs like Aatrox, Rammus, Urgot who are in weird places in the meta. 

I'd rather rito come with a plan for the snake lady then just give me useless info to satisfy me for the time being.
Quit acting like you're the only one they ignore.
